content.raw:
Seems to have problem turning left at some critical point on the circle.

e.g. 

* Move finger around the outside of the teleop circle, from the top, going counter-clockwise.
 * Robot will move forward with increasing angular rate (going left)
 * At about -70 degrees, it suddenly starts turning right.

We're checking the cmd_vel output to make sure where the problem is - either in turtlebot or android_teleop. Jorge will follow up.
